title: Why do I write with my right hand but throw a ball left handed? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is not that uncommon. I'm the same way! I once read that about 20% of natural lefties also write with their right hand. And don't forget that some teachers, especially in parochial schools, used to force kids to write with their right hand. I also cut with scissors with my right. And shoot a gun. And do archery right-handed. But eating, throwing, drinking, boxing, all sports, using tools, etc…all leftie. Go figure.
